name: FireStorm Shopping Cart eCommerce Plugin
author: FireStorm Plugins

sections.description:
The FireStorm eCommerce Plugin is an easy to use shopping cart plugin. The plugin converts your WordPress website into a professional online eCommerce store. Products are not tied to blog posts allowing you to keep the eCommerce store and blog separate. This WordPress eCommerce plugin is ideal for any type of online store. Discounts and promotions can be offered to customers via coupon codes or automatic discounts. This shopping cart plugin was designed with search engine optimization in mind so store pages are optimized for Google search results. Further expandable functions can be downloaded from our website.

Related Links:

  • eCommerce Plugin Homepage
  • Plugin Customization & Theme Development
  • Free Expedited Plugin Support

Features:

  • Easy to Use Administration & Installation
  • Flexible Customization of Store Theme Files
  • Frequent Updates and Expansions
  • SEO Friendly
  • Digital Download Support with Download Protection
  • Customer Discounts (Coupon, Order Total, Shipping, Customer Specific & 2nd Item Discounts)
  • Page Styling (Advanced Styling Available with “Pro Styling” Expansion)
  • Tax Support
  • Advanced Pagination & Sorting
  • Brand Support
  • Easy Order Management
  • Members “My Account” Section
  • Various Shipping Options (Fixed, Percentage, Table & Expansions for UPS & FedEx)
  • Email & PayPal Express Order Support with Expansions for Credit Card Payment Gateways
  • Google eCommerce Tracking
  • Location Customization
  • Product Variation Support, Accessory Association, Related Products and Multiple Images Ability)
  • Widgets for Search, Shop by Category, Shop By Brand and My Cart

Expandable Options:

  • Free Pro Styling Download
  • Pro Functions
  • Multi-Currency
  • User Group Pricing Management with Discounts
  • Distributor & Purchase Order
  • Advanced Product Finder
  • Product Reviews
  • PayPal Pro, Authorize.net & Google Checkout Payment Gateways
  • USPS, FedEx & UPS Shipping Support
  • Amazon Export
  • Mail Chimp Integration
sections.installation:
1. Move the eCommerce plugin directory to your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin in the ‘Plugins’ section in your WordPress administration. The plugin will automatically create the needed WordPress Pages.

short_description: This professional eCommerce plugin gives you the ability to run an advanced online store with an easy to use shopping cart.
